timeline.message: Extracts common code to simplify the batch emitters.
Performs refactorings necessarry after re-writing batch emitters.

Provides a special kind of MetricComputer for large tasks.

This has a heavily reduced batch size, as the tasks within
are expected to be larger. Also there is no daily best effort
computation for this metric.
Adds a missing grant to the auto-setup for MongoDB.
Provides a maintenance command for managing and executing analytical schedulers.
